DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate postoperative pain in Bascom Cleft Lift operation receiving multimodal analgesia in day-case surgery setting. Hypothesis: Multimodal analgesia provides adequate pain relief in patients undergoing Bascom Cleft Lift operation.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Postoperative Pain Following Bascom Cleft Lift Operation
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 ASA physical status 1 and 2 Patient undergoing Bascom operation in prone position Pregnancy Current regular use of drug belonging to the class of opioids Allergy/ intolerance to drugs included in multimodal analgesia regime
